00012 #define SAFE_DELETE(x)  if(x){ delete x; x=NULL;}
00013 
00014 CGfxEngine::CGfxEngine() :
00015 m_fxsurface(NULL),
00016 mp_Effects(NULL),
00017 mp_Cursor(NULL)

00023 void CGfxEngine::createEmptyTilemap(size_t num)
00024 {
00025  freeTilemap();
00026  CTilemap oneTilemap;
00027  Tilemap.assign(num, oneTilemap);
00028 }

00030 void CGfxEngine::createEmptySprites(Uint16 num_sprites)
00031 {
00032  freeSprites();
00033  CSprite sprite;
00034  Sprite.assign(num_sprites, sprite);
00035 }

00059 void CGfxEngine::createEmptyCursorMap(SDL_Surface *surface)
00060 {
00061  freeCursor();
00062  mp_Cursor = new CCursor(surface);
00063 }

00065 // This will store the effect pointer the developer created in one function
00066 // You need this call to make you effect work!
00067 void CGfxEngine::pushEffectPtr(CEffects *pEffect) {
00068  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Effects);
00069  mp_Effects = pEffect;
00070 }

00072 ///
00073 // Destructors
00074 ///
00075 void CGfxEngine::freeCursor()
00076 {
00077  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Cursor);
00078 }
00079 void CGfxEngine::freeTilemap()
00080 {
00081  if( !Tilemap.empty() )
00082   Tilemap.clear();
00083 }
00084 void CGfxEngine::freeFonts()
00085 {
00086  while ( !Font.empty() )
00087  {
00088   CFont &font = Font.back();
00089   font.destroySurface();
00090   Font.pop_back();
00091  }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void CGfxEngine::freeBitmaps(std::vector<CBitmap> &Bitmap)
00095 {
00096  while ( !Bitmap.empty() )
00097  {
00098   CBitmap &bitmap = Bitmap.back();
00099   bitmap.destroySurface();
00100   Bitmap.pop_back();
00101  }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void CGfxEngine::freeSprites()
00105 {
00106  while( !Sprite.empty() )
00107  {
00108   CSprite &sprite = Sprite.back();
00109   sprite.freeSurfaces();
00110   Sprite.pop_back();
00111  }
00112 }
00113 
00114 void CGfxEngine::copyTileToSprite( Uint16 t, Uint16 s, Uint16 ntilestocopy )
00115 {
00116  SDL_Rect src_rect, dst_rect;
00117  
00118  src_rect.w = src_rect.h = 16;
00119  dst_rect.w = dst_rect.h = 16;
00120 
00121  Sprite[s].setSize( 16, 16*ntilestocopy );
00122  Sprite[s].createSurface( Tilemap.at(1).getSDLSurface()->flags, Palette.m_Palette );
00123  
00124  for(Uint8 i=0 ; i<ntilestocopy ; i++)
00125  {
00126   src_rect.x = 16*((t+i)%13);
00127   src_rect.y = 16*((t+i)/13);
00128   
00129   dst_rect.x = 0;
00130   dst_rect.y = 16*i;
00131 
00132   SDL_BlitSurface( Tilemap.at(1).getSDLSurface(), &src_rect, Sprite[s].getSDLSurface(), &dst_rect);
00133  }
00134 }

00136 // draw an empty dialog box, for youseeinyourmind(), etc.
00137 // Maybe this should go to CFont, because it's drawn by fonts...
00138 void CGfxEngine::drawDialogBox(SDL_Surface *DialogSurface, int x1, int y1, int w, int h, Uint32 colour)
00139 {
00140  int x,y,i,j;
00141  SDL_Rect rect;
00142  rect.x = x1*8; rect.w = w*8;
00143  rect.y = y1*8; rect.h = h*8;
00144  
00145  SDL_FillRect(DialogSurface, &rect, colour);
00146 
00147  Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 1, x1*8, y1*8);
00148  Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 3, (x1+w)*8, y1*8);
00149  for(x=(x1*8)+8,i=0;i<w-1;i++)
00150  {
00151   Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 2, x, y1*8);
00152   x+=8;
00153  }
00154  y=(y1+1)*8;
00155  for(j=0;j<h-2;j++)
00156  {
00157   for(x=(x1*8),i=0;i<=w;i++)
00158   {
00159    if (i==0) Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 4, x, y);
00160    else if (i==w) Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 5, x, y);
00161    x+=8;
00162   }
00163   y+=8;
00164  }
00165     for(x=(x1*8),i=0;i<=w;i++)
00166     {
00167   if (i==0) Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 6, x, y);
00168   else if (i==w) Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 8, x, y);
00169   else Font[0].drawCharacter(DialogSurface, 7, x, y);
00170   x+=8;
00171     }
00172 }

00174 ///
00175 // Getters
00176 ///
00177 
00178 CBitmap *CGfxEngine::getBitmap(const std::string &name)
00179 {
00180  std::string s_name;
00181  for(Uint8 i=0 ; i<Bitmap.size() ; i++)
00182  {
00183   s_name = Bitmap[i].getName();
00184 
00185   if(s_name == name)
00186    return &Bitmap[i];
00187  }
00188  return NULL;
00189 }

00191 ///
00192 // Process Routines
00193 ///
00194 void CGfxEngine::process(){
00195  if(mp_Effects){
00196   mp_Effects->process();
00197 
00198   if(runningEffect())
00199   {
00200    killEffect();
00201   }
00202  }
00203 }
00204 
00205 bool CGfxEngine::runningEffect(){
00206  return ( mp_Effects && mp_Effects->finished());
00207 }
00208 
00209 // Kills the effect when called
00210 void CGfxEngine::killEffect()
00211 {
00212  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Effects);
00213 }
00214 
00215 CGfxEngine::~CGfxEngine() {
00216  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Effects);
00217  freeCursor();
00218  freeBitmaps(maskedBitmap);
00219  freeBitmaps(Bitmap);
00220  freeSprites();
00221  freeFonts();
00222  freeTilemap();
00223 }
